953220.name: Corrupted Commander
953220.description:
Corrupted commander is all about being in control of a Mech which is the commander of your army, purchase base defenses or go full offence to claim land and defeat your enemy. Buy power ups to increase your damage, attack speed or rockets to give the extra damage you need to take down large enemies. Or play the strategic approach and command from the back line its up to you how you command and adapt as the game progresses.

How to play:
This Game has an RTS playstyle with a FPS element, this means you can build your attacking waves with strategy and support your troops on the front line. Build scouts to claim neutral turrets and generators for income, then follow up with tanks or the devastating annihilator. Meanwhile defending your own base building defences or choppers. To win you must allow a land vehicle to enter the enemy base or lose by letting an enemy in yours.
And if all else fails fire the nuke!!!

AI:
Take on the Corrupted commander AI in 1v1 or team up with a friend and take him on together, beware hes clever with multiple difficulty settings!!

PVP:
1v1, 2v1 or 2v2, this means you can play aggressive having both of you on the battlefield or have one player managing the building of troops and defending the base.

Units:
Build multiple different units each with a unique quality.
  • Scouts
  • Tanks
  • Annihilators
  • Juggernauts
  • Choppers
  • Jets
  • Pitt49 Fighters
  • Nukes
  • Anti nukes
  • Turrets
953220.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
